question:
A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntarily unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum.
Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work.
In your letter
Explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum
Describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful
Give details of when you would be available for work.
text: I am writing to you to apply for the unpaid voluntary positions in the Bordendro museum for two days in a month.

I am a final year student of history, who is trying to gain some experience and know about the history of Borendro museum, which is related with my study. The main reason  to do this unpaid job is that it is going to help me to find paid jobs in the industry. Besides, It is our  responsibility as a local to help local not-for-profit organisations such as the  Borendro museum to operate.

Personally, I am a very patient young person according to my teachers, who possess not only knowledge of history from a university, but also well-equipped with computing technology. So, I can help you with different sorts of administrative work, which you are looking for.
I have decided  to offer you my service on two Saturdays  of the month initially from 9.00am to 4pm from my busy schedule. If I like your organisation, I could offer more time for you in future.
